description: Cloud-based PDF conversion toolkit that transforms PDF documents into EPUB and Markdown formats with automatic upload and download
submit-a-pdf-file-url-to-convert-it-to-e: Submit a PDF file URL to convert it to EPUB format. Returns a session ID for tracking the conversion progress.
the-url-of-the-pdf-file-to-convert: The URL of the PDF file to convert
the-model-to-use-for-conversion: The model to use for conversion
the-session-id-for-tracking-the-conversi: The session ID for tracking the conversion progress
submit-a-pdf-file-url-to-convert-it-to-m: Submit a PDF file URL to convert it to Markdown format. Returns a session ID for tracking the conversion progress.
the-url-of-the-pdf-file-to-convert2: The URL of the PDF file to convert
the-model-to-use-for-conversion2: The model to use for conversion
the-session-id-for-tracking-the-conversi: The session ID for tracking the conversion progress
poll-the-pdf-to-markdown-transformation-: Poll the PDF to Markdown transformation progress using the session ID. Returns the download URL when completed.
the-session-id-returned-from-the-pdf-to-: The session ID returned from the PDF to Markdown submit task
maximum-number-of-polling-attempts-befor: Maximum number of polling attempts before timeout
the-download-url-for-the-converted-markd: The download URL for the converted Markdown file
poll-the-pdf-to-epub-transformation-prog: Poll the PDF to EPUB transformation progress using the session ID. Returns the current state and download URL when completed.

maximum-number-of-polling-attempts-befor: Maximum number of polling attempts before timeout

poll-until-conversion-completes-and-retu: Poll until conversion completes and return download URL
